Pre-Game Insights: India hold a 14-11 win-loss record over South Africa in the T20I format ahead of their upcoming T20 World Cup 2024 final.

The pitches at the Kensington Oval in Bridgetown, Barbados, have been very good for batting in the T20 World Cup 2024, but it has also given some assistance at different times for the pacers and spinners alike.
With such high-quality players in the South African and Indian squads, the T20 World Cup 2024 final could turn out to be an instant classic.

South Africa squad for T20 World Cup 2024 includes Aiden Markram (c), Ottneil Baartman, Gerald Coetzee, Quinton de Kock, Bjorn Fortuin, Reeza Hendricks, Marco Jansen, Heinrich Klaasen, Keshav Maharaj, David Miller, Anrich Nortje, Kagiso Rabada, Ryan Rickelton, Tabraiz Shamsi, Tristan Stubbs.

India squad for T20 World Cup 2024 includes Rohit Sharma (c), Hardik Pandya, Yashasvi Jaiswal, Virat Kohli, Suryakumar Yadav, Rishabh Pant, Sanju Samson, Shivam Dube, Ravindra Jadeja, Axar Patel, Kuldeep Yadav, Yuzvendra Chahal, Arshdeep Singh, Jasprit Bumrah, Mohammed Siraj.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The average first innings score of 153 might not be enough for either South Africa and India to defend in the final of the tournament.
